response:
wire [1:0] state;

    // Instantiate the state control module
    state_control state_inst (
        .clk(clk),
        .rst_n(rst_n),
        .state(state)
    );

    // Instantiate the waveform generation module
    waveform_gen wave_inst (
        .clk(clk),
        .rst_n(rst_n),
        .state(state),
        .wave(wave)
    );

endmodule

module state_control (
    input clk,
    input rst_n,
    output reg [1:0] state
);

    always @(posedge clk or negedge rst_n) begin
        if (!rst_n) begin
            state <= 2'b00; // Reset state to 00
        end else begin
            case (state)
                2'b00: state <= 2'b01; // Increment state
                2'b01: state <= 2'b10; // Decrement state
                default: state <= 2'b00; // Reset state
            endcase
        end
    end

endmodule

module waveform_gen (
    input clk,
    input rst_n,
    input [1:0] state,
    output reg [4:0] wave
);

    always @(posedge clk or negedge rst_n) begin
        if (!rst_n) begin
            wave <= 5'b000000; // Reset wave to 0
        end else begin
            case (state)
                2'b00: wave <= wave + 1; // Increment wave
                2'b01: wave <= wave - 1; // Decrement wave
                default: wave <= 5'b000000; // Reset wave to 0
            endcase
        end
    end

endmodule

input [16:1] A;      // 16-bit input operand A
    input [16:1] B;      // 16-bit input operand B
    output [16:1] S;     // 16-bit output representing the sum of A and B
    output C_out;         // Carry-out output

    wire [15:0] C;

    // Instantiate 4-bit full adders
    add4 add1 (
        .A(A[3:0]),
        .B(B[3:0]),
        .C_in(0),
        .S(S[3:0]),
        .C_out(C[0])
    );

    add4 add2 (
        .A(A[7:4]),
        .B(B[7:4]),
        .C_in(C[0]),
        .S(S[7:4]),
        .C_out(C[1])
    );

    add4 add3 (
        .A(A[11:8]),
        .B(B[11:8]),
        .C_in(C[1]),
        .S(S[11:8]),
        .C_out(C[2])
    );

    add4 add4 (
        .A(A[15:12]),
        .B(B[15:12]),
        .C_in(C[2]),
        .S(S[15:12]),
        .C_out(C_out)
    );

endmodule

module add4(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input [3:0] A;      // 4-bit input operand A
    input [3:0] B;      // 4-bit input operand B
    input C_in;          // Carry-in input
    output [3:0] S;     // 4-bit output representing the sum of A and B
    output C_out;        // Carry-out output

    wire [3:0] C;

    // Instantiate 4-bit full adders
    add3 add1 (
        .A(A[0]),
        .B(B[0]),
        .C_in(C_in),
        .S(S[0]),
        .C_out(C[0])
    );

    add3 add2 (
        .A(A[1]),
        .B(B[1]),
        .C_in(C[0]),
        .S(S[1]),
        .C_out(C[1])
    );

    add3 add3 (
        .A(A[2]),
        .B(B[2]),
        .C_in(C[1]),
        .S(S[2]),
        .C_out(C[2])
    );

    add3 add4 (
        .A(A[3]),
        .B(B[3]),
        .C_in(C[2]),
        .S(S[3]),
        .C_out(C_out)
    );

endmodule

module add3(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input A;         // Single-bit input operand A
    input B;         // Single-bit input operand B
    input C_in;     // Carry-in input
    output S;        // Single-bit output representing the sum of A and B
    output C_out;    // Carry-out output

    assign {C_out, S} = A + B + C_in;

endmodule

input [16:1] A;      // 16-bit input A
    input [16:1] B;      // 16-bit input B
    output [16:1] S;     // 16-bit output sum
    output C_out;     // Carry output

    wire c1, c2, c3, c4;

    // Instantiate 4-bit full adders
    add4 add1(
        .A(A[4:1]),
        .B(B[4:1]),
        .C_in(1'b0),
        .S(S[4:1]),
        .C_out(c1)
    );

    add4 add2(
        .A(A[8:5]),
        .B(B[8:5]),
        .C_in(c1),
        .S(S[8:5]),
        .C_out(c2)
    );

    add4 add3(
        .A(A[12:9]),
        .B(B[12:9]),
        .C_in(c2),
        .S(S[12:9]),
        .C_out(c3)
    );

    add4 add4(
        .A(A[16:13]),
        .B(B[16:13]),
        .C_in(c3),
        .S(S[16:13]),
        .C_out(c4)
    );

    assign C_out = c4;

endmodule

module add4(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input [4:1] A;      // 4-bit input A
    input [4:1] B;      // 4-bit input B
    input C_in;          // Carry-in input
    output [4:1] S;     // 4-bit output sum
    output C_out;        // Carry-out output

    wire [3:0] c;

    // Instantiate 4-bit full adders
    add3 add1(
        .A(A[1:0]),
        .B(B[1:0]),
        .C_in(C_in),
        .S(S[1:0]),
        .C_out(c[0])
    );

    add3 add2(
        .A(A[3:2]),
        .B(B[3:2]),
        .C_in(c[0]),
        .S(S[3:2]),
        .C_out(c[1])
    );

    add3 add3(
        .A(A[5:4]),
        .B(B[5:4]),
        .C_in(c[1]),
        .S(S[5:4]),
        .C_out(c[2])
    );

    add3 add4(
        .A(A[7:6]),
        .B(B[7:6]),
        .C_in(c[2]),
        .S(S[7:6]),
        .C_out(C_out)
    );

endmodule

module add3(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input [3:0] A;      // 3-bit input A
    input [3:0] B;      // 3-bit input B
    input C_in;          // Carry-in input
    output [3:0] S;     // 3-bit output sum
    output C_out;      // Carry-out output

    wire [2:0] c;

    // Instantiate 3-bit full adders
    add2 add1(
        .A(A[1:0]),
        .B(B[1:0]),
        .C_in(C_in),
        .S(S[1:0]),
        .C_out(c[0])
    );

    add2 add2(
        .A(A[2:1]),
        .B(B[2:1]),
        .C_in(c[0]),
        .S(S[2:1]),
        .C_out(c[1])
    );

    add2 add3(
        .A(A[3:2]),
        .B(B[3:2]),
        .C_in(c[1]),
        .S(S[3:2]),
        .C_out(C_out)
    );

endmodule

module add2(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input [2:0] A;     // 2-bit input A
    input [2:0] B;         // 2-bit input B
    input C_in;           // Carry-in input
    output [2:0] S;    // 2-bit output sum
    output C_out;         // Carry-out output

    // Instantiate 2-bit full adder
    add1 add1(
        .A(A[0]),
        .B(B[0]),
        .C_in(C_in),
        .S(S[0]),
        .C_out(C_out)
    );

endmodule

module add1(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input A;           // 1-bit input A
    input B;             // 1-bit input B
    input C_in;         // Carry-in input
    output S;            // Sum output
    output C_out;    // Carry-out output

    assign {C_out, S} = A + B + C_in;

endmodule

input [16:1] A;       // 16-bit input operand A
    input [16:1] B;       // 16-bit input operand B
    output [16:1] S;     // 16-bit output sum
    output C_out;         // Carry-out output

    wire [15:0] C; // Carry signals from each 4-bit CLA

    // Instantiate 4-bit CLA blocks
    add4 add1(
        .A(A[3:0]),
        .B(B[3:0]),
        .C_in(1'b0),
        .S(S[3:0]),
        .C_out(C[0])
    );

    add4 add2(
        .A(A[7:4]),
        .B(B[7:4]),
        .C_in(C[0]),
        .S(S[7:4]),
        .C_out(C[1])
    );

    add4 add3(
        .A(A[11:8]),
        .B(B[11:8]),
        .C_in(C[1]),
        .S(S[11:8]),
        .C_out(C[2])
    );

    add4 add4(
        .A(A[15:12]),
        .B(B[15:12]),
        .C_in(C[2]),
        .S(S[15:12]),
        .C_out(C[3])
    );

    assign C_out = C[3]; // Final carry-out is the last carry signal

endmodule

module add4(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input [3:0] A;       // 4-bit input operand A
    input [3:0] B;       // 4-bit input operand B
    input C_in;          // Carry-in input
    output [3:0] S;     // 4-bit output sum
    output C_out;        // Carry-out output

    // Perform addition with carry-in
    assign {C_out, S} = A + B + C_in;

endmodule

input [16:1] A;       // 16-bit input operand A
    input [16:1] B;       // 16-bit input operand B
    output [16:1] S;     // 16-bit output sum
    output C_out;         // Carry-out output

    wire C1, C2, C3, C4;

    // Instantiate 4-bit CLA blocks
    carry_lookahead_adder add1 (
        .A(A[15:12]),
        .B(B[15:12]),
        .C_in(1'b0),
        .S(S[15:12]),
        .C_out(C1)
    );

    carry_lookahead_adder add2 (
        .A(A[11:8]),
        .B(B[11:8]),
        .C_in(C1),
        .S(S[11:8]),
        .C_out(C2)
    );

    carry_lookahead_adder add3 (
        .A(A[7:4]),
        .B(B[7:4]),
        .C_in(C2),
        .S(S[7:4]),
        .C_out(C3)
    );

    carry_lookahead_adder add4 (
        .A(A[3:0]),
        .B(B[3:0]),
        .C_in(C3),
        .S(S[3:0]),
        .C_out(C4)
    );

    assign C_out = C4;

endmodule

module carry_lookahead_adder(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input [3:0] A;       // 4-bit input operand A
    input [3:0] B;       // 4-bit input operand B
    input C_in;          // Carry-in input
    output [3:0] S;       // 4-bit output sum
    output C_out;         // Carry-out output

    wire [3:0] C;

    // Full adder instances for each bit
    full_adder fa0 (
        .A(A[0]),
        .B(B[0]),
        .C_in(C_in),
        .S(S[0]),
        .C(C[0])
    );

    full_adder fa1 (
        .A(A[1]),
        .B(B[1]),
        .C_in(C[0]),
        .S(S[1]),
        .C(C[1])
    );

    full_adder fa2 (
        .A(A[2]),
        .B(B[2]),
        .C_in(C[1]),
        .S(S[2]),
        .C(C[2])
    );

    full_adder fa3 (
        .A(A[3]),
        .B(B[3]),
        .C_in(C[2]),
        .S(S[3]),
        .C(C_out)
    );

endmodule

module full_adder(A, B, C_in, S, C);
    input A;         // Input A
    input B;         // Input B
    input C_in;     // Carry-in
    output S;         // Output sum
    output C;         // Output carry

    assign {C, S} = A + B + C_in;

endmodule

input [16:1] A;      // 16-bit input operand A
    input [16:1] B;      // 16-bit input operand B
    output [16:1] S;     // 16-bit output sum
    output C_out;         // Carry-out output

    wire [15:0] C; // Intermediate carry signals

    // Instantiate 4-bit CLA blocks
    CLA_4bit add1 (
        .A(A[4:1]),
        .B(B[4:1]),
        .C_in(1'b0),
        .S(S[4:1]),
        .C_out(C[0])
    );

    CLA_4bit add2 (
        .A(A[8:5]),
        .B(B[8:5]),
        .C_in(C[0]),
        .S(S[8:5]),
        .C_out(C[1])
    );

    CLA_4bit add3 (
        .A(A[12:9]),
        .B(B[12:9]),
        .C_in(C[1]),
        .S(S[12:9]),
        .C_out(C[2])
    );

    CLA_4bit add4 (
        .A(A[16:13]),
        .B(B[16:13]),
        .C_in(C[2]),
        .S(S[16:13]),
        .C_out(C_out)
    );

endmodule

module CLA_4bit(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input [4:1] A;      // 4-bit input operand A
    input [4:1] B;      // 4-bit input operand B
    input C_in;         // Carry-in input
    output [4:1] S;     // 4-bit output sum
    output C_out;        // Carry-out output

    wire [3:0] C; // Intermediate carry signals

    // Instantiate 4-bit CLA blocks
    CLA_4bit cla1 (
        .A(A[4:2]),
        .B(B[4:2]),
        .C_in(C_in),
        .S(S[4:2]),
        .C_out(C[0])
    );

    CLA_4bit cla2 (
        .A(A[8:5]),
        .B(B[8:5]),
        .C_in(C[0]),
        .S(S[8:5]),
        .C_out(C[1])
    );

    CLA_4bit cla3 (
        .A(A[12:9]),
        .B(B[12:9]),
        .C_in(C[1]),
        .S(S[12:9]),
        .C_out(C[2])
    );

    CLA_4bit cla4 (
        .A(A[16:13]),
        .B(B[16:13]),
        .C_in(C[2]),
        .S(S[16:13]),
        .C_out(C_out)
    );

endmodule

module CLA_4bit(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input [4:1] A;      // 4-bit input operand A
    input [4:1] B;      // 4-bit input operand B
    input C_in;         // Carry-in input
    output [4:1] S;     // 4-bit output sum
    output C_out;        // Carry-out output

    wire [3:0] C; // Intermediate carry signals

    // Instantiate 4-bit CLA blocks
    CLA_4bit cla1 (
        .A(A[4:2]),
        .B(B[4:2]),
        .C_in(C_in),
        .S(S[4:2]),
        .C_out(C[0])
    );

    CLA_4bit cla2 (
        .A(A[8:5]),
        .B(B[8:5]),
        .C_in(C[0]),
        .S(S[8:5]),
        .C_out(C[1])
    );

    CLA_4bit cla3 (
        .A(A[12:9]),
        .B(B[12:9]),
        .C_in(C[1]),
        .S(S[12:9]),
        .C_out(C[2])
    );

    CLA_4bit cla4 (
        .A(A[16:13]),
        .B(B[16:13]),
        .C_in(C[2]),
        .S(S[16:13]),
        .C_out(C_out)
    );

endmodule

module CLA_4bit(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input [4:1] A;      // 4-bit input operand A
    input [4:1] B;      // 4-bit input operand B
    input C_in;         // Carry-in input
    output [4:1] S;     // 4-bit output sum
    output C_out;        // Carry-out output

    wire [3:0] C; // Intermediate carry signals

    // Instantiate 4-bit CLA blocks
    CLA_4bit cla1 (
        .A(A[4:2]),
        .B(B[4:2]),
        .C_in(C_in),
        .S(S[4:2]),
        .C_out(C[0])
    );

    CLA_4bit cla2 (
        .A(A[8:5]),
        .B(B[8:5]),
        .C_in(C[0]),
        .S(S[8:5]),
        .C_out(C[1])
    );

    CLA_4bit cla3 (
        .A(A[12:9]),
        .B(B[12:9]),
        .C_in(C[1]),
        .S(S[12:9]),
        .C_out(C[2])
    );

    CLA_4bit cla4 (
        .A(A[16:13]),
        .B(B[16:13]),
        .C_in(C[2]),
        .S(S[16:13]),
        .C_out(C_out)
    );

endmodule

input [16:1] A;      // 16-bit input operand A
    input [16:1] B;      // 16-bit input operand B
    output [16:1] S;     // 16-bit output sum
    output C_out;         // Carry-out output

    wire [15:0] C;

    // Instantiate 4-bit CLA blocks
    cla_4bit add1 (
        .A(A[4:1]),
        .B(B[4:1]),
        .C_in(1'b0),
        .S(S[4:1]),
        .C_out(C[0])
    );

    cla_4bit add2 (
        .A(A[8:5]),
        .B(B[8:5]),
        .C_in(C[0]),
        .S(S[8:5]),
        .C_out(C[1])
    );

    cla_4bit add3 (
        .A(A[12:9]),
        .B(B[12:9]),
        .C_in(C[1]),
        .S(S[12:9]),
        .C_out(C[2])
    );

    cla_4bit add4 (
        .A(A[16:13]),
        .B(B[16:13]),
        .C_in(C[2]),
        .S(S[16:13]),
        .C_out(C_out)
    );
endmodule

module cla_4bit(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input [4:1] A;      // 4-bit input operand A
    input [4:1] B;      // 4-bit input operand B
    input C_in;         // Carry-in input
    output [4:1] S;     // 4-bit output sum
    output C_out;      // Carry-out output

    wire [3:0] C;

    // Instantiate 4-bit full adder blocks
    full_adder fa1 (
        .A(A[1]),
        .B(B[1]),
        .C_in(C_in),
        .S(S[1]),
        .C_out(C[0])
    );

    full_adder fa2 (
        .A(A[2]),
        .B(B[2]),
        .C_in(C[0]),
        .S(S[2]),
        .C_out(C[1])
    );

    full_adder fa3 (
        .A(A[3]),
        .B(B[3]),
        .C_in(C[1]),
        .S(S[3]),
        .C_out(C[2])
    );

    full_adder fa4 (
        .A(A[4]),
        .B(B[4]),
        .C_in(C[2]),
        .S(S[4]),
        .C_out(C_out)
    );
endmodule

module full_adder(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input A;         // Input bit A
    input B;         // Input bit B
    input C_in;     // Carry-in input
    output S;       // Output sum
    output C_out;    // Carry-out output

    assign {C_out, S} = A + B + C_in;
endmodule

input [16:1] A;       // 16-bit input operand A
    input [16:1] B;       // 16-bit input operand B
    output [16:1] S;     // 16-bit output sum
    output C_out;         // Carry-out output

    wire [15:0] C1, C2, C3, C4;

    // Instantiate 4-bit full adders
    full_adder_4bit add1 (
        .A(A[3:0]),
        .B(B[3:0]),
        .C_in(1'b0),
        .S(S[3:0]),
        .C_out(C1)
    );

    full_adder_4bit add2 (
        .A(A[7:4]),
        .B(B[7:4]),
        .C_in(C1),
        .S(S[7:4]),
        .C_out(C2)
    );

    full_adder_4bit add3 (
        .A(A[11:8]),
        .B(B[11:8]),
        .C_in(C2),
        .S(S[11:8]),
        .C_out(C3)
    );

    full_adder_4bit add4 (
        .A(A[15:12]),
        .B(B[15:12]),
        .C_in(C3),
        .S(S[15:12]),
        .C_out(C4)
    );

    assign C_out = C4;

endmodule

module full_adder_4bit(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input [3:0] A;       // 4-bit input operand A
    input [3:0] B;       // 4-bit input operand B
    input C_in;           // Carry-in input
    output [3:0] S;      // 4-bit output sum
    output C_out;         // Carry-out output

    wire [3:0] C;

    // Instantiate 4-bit full adders
    full_adder fa1 (
        .A(A[0]),
        .B(B[0]),
        .C_in(C_in),
        .S(S[0]),
        .C_out(C[0])
    );

    full_adder fa2 (
        .A(A[1]),
        .B(B[1]),
        .C_in(C[0]),
        .S(S[1]),
        .C_out(C[1])
    );

    full_adder fa3 (
        .A(A[2]),
        .B(B[2]),
        .C_in(C[1]),
        .S(S[2]),
        .C_out(C[2])
    );

    full_adder fa4 (
        .A(A[3]),
        .B(B[3]),
        .C_in(C[2]),
        .S(S[3]),
        .C_out(C_out)
    );

endmodule

module full_adder(A, B, C_in, S, C_out);
    input A;       // 1-bit input operand A
    input B;       // 1-bit input operand B
    input C_in;     // Carry-in input
    output S;       // Sum output
    output C_out;    // Carry-out output

    assign {C_out, S} = A + B + C_in;

endmodule

latch latch0 (
        .clk(clk),
        .reset(reset),
        .d(d0),
        .load(load0),
        .q(q0)
    );

    latch latch1 (
        .clk(clk),
        .reset(reset),
        .d(d1),
        .load(load1),
        .q(q1)
    );
endmodule

module latch (
    input clk,
    input reset,
    input [7:0] d,
    input load,
    output reg [7:0] q
);
    always @(posedge clk or posedge reset) begin
        if (reset) begin
            q <= 0;
        end else if (load) begin
            q <= d;
        end
    end
endmodule

latch latch0 (
        .clk(clk),
        .reset(reset),
        .d(d0),
        .load(load0),
        .q(q0)
    );

    latch latch1 (
        .clk(clk),
        .reset(reset),
        .d(d1),
        .load(load1),
        .q(q1)
    );
endmodule

module latch (
    input clk,
    input reset,
    input [7:0] d,
    input load,
    output reg [7:0] q
);
    always @(posedge clk or posedge reset) begin
        if (reset) begin
            q <= 0;
        end else if (load) begin
            q <= d;
        end
    end
endmodule

// Shift register 0
    shift_register sr0 (
        .clk(clk),
        .rst(rst),
        .load(load0),
        .data(data0),
        .shift(shift0),
        .out(out0)
    );

    // Shift register 1
    shift_register sr1 (
        .clk(clk),
        .rst(rst),
        .load(load1),
        .data(data1),
        .shift(shift1),
        .out(out1)
    );

endmodule

module shift_register(
    input clk,
    input rst,
    input load,
    input [7:0] data,
    input shift,
    output reg [7:0] out
);
    always @(posedge clk or posedge rst) begin
        if (rst) begin
            out <= 8'b00000000;
        end else if (load) begin
            out <= data;
        end else if (shift) begin
            out <= out >> 1;
        end
    end
endmodule

// Shift register 0

wire [3:0] count;

    // Instantiate the counter logic
    counter_logic u_counter_logic (
        .rst_n(rst_n),
        .clk(clk),
        .valid_count(valid_count),
        .count(count)
    );

    // Instantiate the output register
    output_register u_output_register (
        .rst_n(rst_n),
        .valid_count(valid_count),
        .count(count),
        .out(out)
    );

endmodule

module counter_logic (
    input rst_n,
    input clk,
    input valid_count,
    output reg [3:0] count
);

    always @(posedge clk or negedge rst_n) begin
        if (!rst_n) begin
            count <= 4'b0000; // Reset count to 0
        end else if (valid_count) begin
            if (count == 4'b1111) begin
                count <= 4'b0000; // Wrap around to 0
            end else begin
                count <= count + 1; // Increment count
            end
        end
    end

endmodule

module output_register (
    input rst_n,
    input valid_count,
    input [3:0] count,
    output reg [3:0] out
);

    always @(posedge rst_n or posedge valid_count) begin
        if (!rst_n) begin
            out <= 4'b0000; // Reset output to 0
        end else begin
            out <= count; // Update output with count
        end
    end

endmodule

wire [7:0] data0;
    wire [7:0] data1;
    wire [7:0] data2;

    // Instantiate the multiplexer submodules
    mux_path0 mux0 (
        .clk(clk),
        .d0(d0),
        .d1(d1),
        .d2(d2),
        .sel(sel[0]),
        .data_out(data0)
    );

    mux_path1 mux1 (
        .clk(clk),
        .d0(d0),
        .d1(d1),
        .d2(d2),
        .sel(sel[1]),
        .data_out(data1)
    );

    mux_path2 mux2 (
        .clk(clk),
        .d0(d0),
        .d1(d1),
        .d2(d2),
        .sel(sel[2]),
        .data_out(data2)
    );

    // Output the selected data
    assign data_out = (sel == 3'b000) ? data0 :
                     (sel == 3'b001) ? data1 :
                     data2;

endmodule

module mux_path0 (
    input clk,
    input [7:0] d0,
    input [7:0] d1,
    input [7:0] d2,
    input sel,
    output reg [7:0] data_out
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (sel) begin
            data_out <= d0;
        end else begin
            data_out <= d1;
        end
    end

endmodule

module mux_path1 (
    input clk,
    input [7:0] d0,
    input [7:0] d1,
    input [7:0] d2,
    input sel,
    output reg [7:0] data_out
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (sel) begin
            data_out <= d1;
        end else begin
            data_out <= d2;
        end
    end

endmodule

module mux_path2 (
    input clk,
    input [7:0] d0,
    input [7:0] d1,
    input [7:0] d2,
    input sel,
    output reg [7:0] data_out
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (sel) begin
            data_out <= d2;
        end else begin
            data_out <= d0;
        end
    end

endmodule

wire [7:0] data0;
    wire [7:0] data1;
    wire [7:0] data2;

    // Instantiate the three path multiplexers
    mux_path0 mux0 (
        .clk(clk),
        .d0(d0),
        .d1(d1),
        .d2(d2),
        .sel(sel),
        .data_out(data0)
    );

    mux_path1 mux1 (
        .clk(clk),
        .d0(d0),
        .d1(d1),
        .d2(d2),
        .sel(sel),
        .data_out(data1)
    );

    mux_path2 mux2 (
        .clk(clk),
        .d0(d0),
        .d1(d1),
        .d2(d2),
        .sel(sel),
        .data_out(data2)
    );

    // Select the output based on the selection signal
    assign data_out = (sel == 3'b000) ? data0 :
                      (sel == 3'b001) ? data1 :
                      data2;

endmodule

module mux_path0 (
    input clk,
    input [7:0] d0,
    input [7:0] d1,
    input [7:0] d2,
    input [2:0] sel,
    output reg [7:0] data_out
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (sel == 3'b000) begin
            data_out <= d0;
        end
    end

endmodule

module mux_path1 (
    input clk,
    input [7:0] d0,
    input [7:0] d1,
    input [7:0] d2,
    input [2:0] sel,
    output reg [7:0] data_out
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (sel == 3'b001) begin
            data_out <= d1;
        end
    end

endmodule

module mux_path2 (
    input clk,
    input [7:0] d0,
    input [7:0] d1,
    input [7:0] d2,
    input [2:0] sel,
    output reg [7:0] data_out
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (sel == 3'b010) begin
            data_out <= d2;
        end
    end

endmodule
